sentences.en: Coal consumption in Manchester was measured in millions of tonnes, and its smoke became, as Lewis Mumford remarked, "the very incense of the new industrialism".
sentences.cn: 估计曼彻斯特消耗了数百万吨的煤炭，引用路易斯·芒福德的话说，这个城市上空飘着的烟“就是新工业主义的香气”。

sentences.en: Industrialism began to usurp the production and distribution functions of the family.
sentences.cn: 工业化生产已开始篡夺家庭生产和分配的功能.

sentences.en: The band has undergone radical shifts in direction incorporating Punk , minimalist Industrialism and even roots Folk.
sentences.cn: 乐队转换过很多风格,比如朋克、极少工业主义甚至根源民谣.

words.tran_cn: 工业的，产业的；从事工业的；供工业用的；来自勤劳的
实业家；工业家；产业工人
使工业化；将…组成产业（industrialize的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: the system by which a society gets its wealth through industries and machinery
